name: 教育統計
description: Statistics in Education is an undergraduate course in using quantitative methods for inquiry in the social and behavioral sciences, including topics in teaching Chinese as a second language. The purpose of this course is to present an introduction to statistics that emphasizes a conceptual understanding of statistical ideas and research designs, computer-based data analysis, interpretation of results, and communication of statistical procedures and findings. Students will be exposed to the fundamental concepts and procedures of descriptive and inferential statistics. The students will also have interactive discussions and hands-on activities using a computer-software package (e.g., SPSS) to emphasize applying statistical methods to relevant research and practices.
goals: Can develop greater understanding of basic concepts and various statistical methods uti-lized in scientific research, particularly in teaching Chinese as a second/foreign language
Can select, conduct appropriate statistical methods through the use of a computer software package and interpret the results
Can apply statistical concepts and methods to instructional and research work and evaluate authentic information encountered in daily life
syllabus:
主題一、統計概論  
主題二、次數分配  
主題三、集中量數  
主題四、變異量數  
主題五、相對地位量數  
主題六、常態分配  
主題七、相關分析  
主題八、推論統計
